segments.text: I see the girl standing next to the boy, reaching up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she really wants that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's aware of how dangerous it is for the boy to be standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely missing what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad that she's not paying attention to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is creating such a slippery mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt because of all this water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he's about to lose his balance any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will be able to catch him if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much is happening in this kitchen without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
